name: UpdateFreshserviceAnnouncement
description:
Update an existing Freshservice announcement.

Use this tool to modify an existing announcement in Freshservice. This is useful for updating content, title, or any other property of an announcement identified by its ID.

parameters.name: announcement_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the announcement to update in Freshservice.

parameters.name: announcement_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object with details to update the announcement (title, body, visibility, etc.).

created_by.description: Unique identifier of the agent to created this Announcement

state.description: State of the Announcement active, archived, scheduled

body.description: Body of the Announcement in plain text

body_html.description: Body of the Announcement in HTML format

visible_from.description: Timestamp at which Announcement becomes active

visible_till.description: Timestamp until which Announcement is active

visibility.description: Who can see the announcement. Values - everyone, agents_only, agents_and_groups

departments.description: Array of Department IDs that can view this Announcement

groups.description: Array of Group IDs that can view this Announcement

is_read.description: True if the logged-in-user has read the announcement. False, otherwise

send_email.description: True if the announcement needs to be sent via email as well. False, otherwise

additional_emails.description: Additional email addresses to which the announcement needs to be sent

created_at.description: Timestamp at which Announcement was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which Announcement was last updated

value_schema.description: Announcement details that needs to be updated
